title: KORW/KORB/KORQ/KORD â€” Bitwise Logical OR Masks

fields.name: Instruction Modes
fields.value:
`KORW k1, k2, k3`
`KORB k1, k2, k3`
`KORQ k1, k2, k3`
`KORD k1, k2, k3`

fields.name: Description
fields.value: Performs a bitwise OR between the vector mask k2 and the vector mask k3, and writes the result into vector mask k1 (three-operand form).

footer.text: Thanks to Felix Cloutier for the online x86 reference
